channel.title: Wtf random event compiler error!
channel.description: hey guys when i try to add random events to stop autoers but i am getting these errors and i followed this tut: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,437268.msg3213125.html#msg3213125 ERROR: .\src\client.java:14904: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEvent location: class client else if (randomEvent == 4) { ^ .\src\client.java:14911: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEvent location: class client else if (randomEvent == 4) { ^ .\src\client.java:14918: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEvent location: class client else if (randomEvent == 4) { ^ .\src\client.java:14925: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEvent location: class client else if (randomEvent == 4) { ^ .\src\client.java:14932: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEvent location: class client else if (randomEvent == 4) { ^ .\src\client.java:14939: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEvent location: class client else if (randomEvent == 4) { ^ .\src\client.java:14946: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEvent location: class client else if (randomEvent == 4) { ^ .\src\client.java:14953: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEvent location: class client else if (randomEvent == 4) { ^ .\src\client.java:14960: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEvent location: class client else if (randomEvent == 4) { ^ .\src\client.java:21160: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEvent location: class client randomEvent = 4; ^ .\src\client.java:21175: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEvent location: class client randomEvent = 4; ^ .\src\client.java:21190: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEvent location: class client randomEvent = 4; ^ .\src\client.java:21196: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEvent location: class client randomEvent = misc.random(3); ^ .\src\client.java:21198: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEvent location: class client if(randomEvent == 1) ^ .\src\client.java:21202: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEvent location: class client else if (randomEvent == 2) ^ .\src\client.java:21206: cannot find symbol symbol : variable randomEvent location: class client else if (randomEvent == 3) ^ 16 errors Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Wtf random event compiler error!
item.dc:creator: @own_master own master
item.description:
@own_master wrote:

hey guys when i try to add random events to stop autoers but i am getting these errors and i followed this tut:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars
